alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:07PM CDT until May 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Southern Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... Northern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... Bureau County in north central Illinois... Scott County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Clinton County in east central Iowa... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 606 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located over Pleasant Valley, or near Bettendorf, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... East Moline and Illiniwek Forest Preserve around 610 PM CDT. Le Claire, Hampton, Fishermans Corner, Silvis Heights and Rock Island County Fairgrounds around 615 PM CDT. Silvis and Carbon Cliff around 620 PM CDT. Port Byron and Rapids City around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Coal Valley, Barstow, Colona, Cleveland, Green River, Geneseo, Osborn, Dayton, Joslin and Shady Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
